alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Darlington; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Florence, northeastern Georgetown, central Darlington, southwestern Horry, central Marion and northeastern Williamsburg Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 738 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cartersville to near Plantersville. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Myrtle Beach, Conway, Hartsville, Lake City, Darlington, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Myrtle Beach Airport, Murrells Inlet, Socastee, Red Hill, Springmaid Pier, Garden City, Timmonsville, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Lamar, Quinby and Hemingway. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 125 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina near mile marker 146, and between mile markers 148 and 167. SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 11. SC Highway 22 near mile marker 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Darlington; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg
